documentation.xhtml: The config manager (to load/save/activate configuration data)
Relay to start the pumps motors
Relay to open the upper shutter panel
Relay to close the upper shutter panel
Relay to open the upper shutter panel
Relay to close the upper shutter panel
Change the operating state (e.g. AUTO, MANUAL, ...)
Synchronize the dome once with the axes
Stop the rotation movement and/or tracking
Combined aperture status (i.e. of both panels)
Aperture status of the lower panel
Aperture status of the upper panel
Is the I/O in a healthy state?
The config of the shutter mechanism
The config of the bottom panel set
The maximum distance between telescope and dome while tracking
Polling frequency of the wireless I/O device, in seconds. Negative value = no polling.
IP address of the wireless I/O device
Port of the wireless I/O device
Unit ID the wireless I/O device
The timeout of a single command. Does not lead to an error (yet), because we still retry.
The total timeout of the retries. If no valid data is received after this time, then we consider the shutters in error.
Estimated opening time of the upper panel, in seconds
Estimated closing time of the upper panel, in seconds
Estimated opening time of the lower panel, in seconds
Estimated closing time of the lower panel, in seconds
Opening timeout of the lower panel, in seconds
Closing timeout of the lower panel, in seconds
Opening timeout of the upper panel, in seconds
Closing timeout of the upper panel, in seconds
Time to wait after a stop command, in seconds
Below this lag value (in degrees), the lag is considered not an error
True if the dome is powered off due to a person entering the dome
True if the dome is tracking the telescope
Actual azimuth position of the telescope Axes
Name of this function block instance
Buffer to write all logging to
Temporary buffer to write logging by parts (sub-statemachines) to

ST.xhtml: THIS^.parts.shutter._log( name := 'shutter', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.rotation._log( name := 'rotation', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.io._log( name := 'io', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.configManager._log( name := 'configManager', buffer := subBuffer); LOGGER( name := name, actualStatus := THIS^.actualStatus, previousStatus := THIS^.previousStatus, buffer := buffer, subBuffer := subBuffer, pHealthStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.healthStatus), pBusyStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.busyStatus));

False if the signal is not present OR if there is a communication error
False if the signal is not present OR if there is a communication error
False if the signal is not present OR if there is a communication error
True if the wireless communication to the shutter signals is timing out
True if the wireless communication to the shutter signals is in error (other than timeout)
The error id if wirelessError is true
Estimated time remaining to open/close the upper panel
Estimated time remaining to open/close the lower panel
